robot.navigation

Class Traveler

  • java.lang.Object
    • robot.navigation.Traveler

  • public class Traveler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will represent an object which controls the navigation of our robot in such a way, that we can move our robot to individual squares on the map. This is another layer on top of the navigation that seperates moving in cm to moving in tiles. Just as a reference this is how we perceive the coordinate system Up | Left<_____|______>Right | | Down RIGHT NOW SCAN WILL ALWAYS RETURN TRUE. JUST TO TEST WITHOUT COL DETECTION
